Open Movement devices are miniature, embeddable, open source sensors developed at [http://di.ncl.ac.uk/blog/open-movement/ Newcastle University, UK].  The source code for the firmware and software is available under a [http://www.opensource.org/licenses/BSD-2-Clause BSD 2-clause license] ([http://code.google.com/p/openmovement/source/browse/trunk/Firmware/LICENSE.TXT source text]), and the hardware (PCB designs, layouts and schematics), enclosure designs and documentation are available under a [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Creative Commons 3.0 BY Attribution License] ([http://openmovement.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Firmware/LICENSE.TXT source text]).

* [OpenMovement Overview]
  * [AX3 AX3 Movement logging]
  * [WAX3 WAX3 Wireless accelerometers]
  * [AXi AXi '9-Axis' device with display]
  * [WAX9 WAX9 Wireless IMU]
  * [BuildAX BuildAX Building monitoring]
  * [WeighAX WeightAX Weight monitoring]
